nodes.text: After stealing an encryption module, the Galactic Republic's D-Squad attempted to escape the planet Abafar after their shuttle crashed there.

When they reached the city Pons Ora, they discovered the amnesiac clone commando Gregor, who had gone missing following the Battle of Sarrish. They also discovered a Separatist plot to load rhydonium onto an empty Republic attack cruiser to bomb a Republic strategy conference. The team was able to escape to the attack cruiser.
